data.title: Country Profile Central African Republic

data.text:
Central African Republic

CABRI member since: 2010

Region: Central Africa

Currency: CFA Franc (XAF)

Population: 4.9 million

Capital: Bangui

Ministry website: www.finances.gouv.cf/

Fiscal year: January-December

Regional Economic Community: CEN-SAD, ECCAS

Budgets in Africa

Africa Debt Monitor
